remarks.format: ## Remarks 在数据绑定中的数据处理操作期间发生错误时引发事件（例如，格式或分析操作引发异常或更新数据源失败时）。The event is raised when an error occurs during a data processing operation in a data-bound (for example, when a format or parse operation throws an exception or the update of the data source fails). 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用信息显示关于消息框中。The following code example demonstrates how to use a to display information about a in a message box. 此代码摘自类概述主题。This code is part of a larger example provided in the class overview topic.
